mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_license_info (license_id, license_name, grade, acquired_date, license_number, agency, seeker_id) VALUES (user_license_info_seq.NEXTVAL, #{licenseName}, #{grade}, TO_DATE(#{acquiredDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{licenseNumber}, #{agency}, #{seekerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_license_info SET license_name = #{licenseName}, grade = #{grade}, acquired_date = TO_DATE(#{acquiredDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), license_number = #{licenseNumber}, agency = #{agency}, seeker_id = #{seekerId} WHERE license_id = #{licenseId}
mapper.select: SELECT license_name, grade, TO_CHAR(acquired_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS acquired_date, license_number, agency FROM user_license_info WHERE license_id=#{licenseId}
SELECT license_name, grade, TO_CHAR(acquired_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS acquired_date, license_number, agency FROM user_license_info WHERE seeker_id = #{seekerId}
